system.requirements: Tier 1: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Insanity 10+, Hatred (Any). Aptitudes: Weapon Skill, Offence
system.effect: The Sister adds their Insanity Bonus to the damage they inflict with melee attacks on targets they possess appropriate Hatred talents for.

description.value: The Sister adds their Insanity Bonus to the damage they inflict with melee attacks on targets they possess appropriate Hatred talents for.
